get.description: Get all airports. We do not recommend using this route without any search query. This route has over 20k records

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search query for airport. Can be iata, ident(icao), name or a part of any these. Searching is case insensitive

get.description: Get airlines.  Has over 800 records, only has commerical airlines.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The full(or a part of) name, ident or icao. Case Insensitive.

post.description: Get airline with search query. This doesn't check if the number is correct

get.description: Get all flights between two airports for a specific date
Get all aircraft currently flying within a specified geographic bounding box using FlightAware data with comprehensive aircraft details

parameters.name: minLat
parameters.description: Minimum latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: maxLat
parameters.description: Maximum latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: minLng
parameters.description: Minimum longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: maxLng
parameters.description: Maximum longitude of the bounding box

200.description: List of flights within the specified bounds with detailed aircraft information

get.summary: Get flights within geographic bounds(deprecated - will return nothing)

get.description: Returns a list of all flights that have been tracked in the system, sorted by most recently created. Limited to 50 most recent flights.

200.description: List of tracked flights with complete flight information

get.description: Get the flight path with all position data points for a specific flight

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Flight date (ISO format). Defaults to current date if not provided

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone from which the request is being made.

400.description: Invalid request parameters or flight not found

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific flight including real-time tracking data

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Flight date (ISO format). Defaults to current date if not provided

parameters.name: timezone
parameters.description: The timezone from which the request is being made.

parameters.name: forceUpdate
parameters.description: Force update the flight data(used to refresh the flight data)

get.description: Returns comprehensive statistics about tracked flights including passport data, aircraft stats, airlines, airports, and routes

200.description: Profile statistics including passport data and flight analytics

token.description: JWT token which will be used for all other requests
JWT token which will be used for all other requests

filedEte.description: Estimated time en route in seconds

routeDistance.description: Planned flight distance in statute miles

filedAltitude.description: Filed IFR altitude in 100s of feet

fa_flight_id.description: FlightAware flight ID for this position

altitude.description: Aircraft altitude in hundreds of feet

update_type.description: Update type: P=projected, O=oceanic, Z=radar, A=ADS-B, M=multilateration, D=datalink, X=surface and near surface, S=space-based, V=virtual event

actual_distance.description: Distance flown in miles as of the latest position point

totalDurationMinutes.description: Total flight duration in minutes (including delays)

image.description: Airline image URL from DB, when available

departureCount.description: Number of flights departing from this airport
